svcsubproc.title: APADS Function
svcsubproc.para: The air conditioning protection and diagnostics system (APADS) is designed to protect major air conditioning (A/C) components from damage, and to diagnose A/C system problems.

APADS is a practical, user focused design, intended to reduce maintenance costs, increase A/C system durability, and ease troubleshooting tasks. The system achieves these objectives with low-risk, proven technology, without any changes to the basic A/C refrigerant system.
The APADS will detect both major and minor problems early. This prevents the failure of major components, thus saving money and costly downtime.
